message: I'm excited to offer you this amazing product at a special price of $120. It's a great deal, and I think you'll really love it!
Thanks for the offer, Alice. I appreciate it, but I'm looking to spend closer to $100. Would you be willing to come down a bit?
I can do a bit better than that, Bob. I'm willing to meet you in the middle at $110. It's the lowest I can go, but I think you'll find it's still a great deal.
